Well a good Kat player is difficult to shutdown but a good Akali player takes nothing more than a pink and CC to deal.

I used to main Katarina and I really enjoyed the games I played with her. I recently picked up Akali and have played only 1 PvP game with her.

They are both great roamers but I'd say that I find Akali better at ganking. I got a few kills early from my Jungler and then sat bot lane for a bit and just ate from the buffet. Personally I find Akali easier and more fun to play because once I was 5-10 kills in I understood why people called her broken.

Akali has I higher damage from her AA's, meaning that once I've popped my combo I still can dish out more damage in a 1v1. Katarina's laning is probably easier and is less reliant on her ultimate for trades. She is resource-less meaning you only have to keep track of your cooldowns, however Akali is less dependent on picking up a few kills in teamfights as it's easy to get caught out as Katarina if you don't fully kill your target with the combo and have to AA them because all your abilities are on cooldown and you have no means of easy escapes (-Flash of course). 

Overall I think both champions are fun but I'm leaning more towards Akali. Less people play her anyway.
